Bob can introduce you to 4 people at Motorola Mobility (a Lenovo Company)
Bob worked at Motorola Mobility (a Lenovo Company)
Customer Success and Retentions Manager North America
Sr. Development Manager - Global IT Program Office & Business Process Management

Senior member of program office charged with consolidating Motorola’s Global IT infrastructure. Coordinated multi-functional project teams. Served as liaison to IBM consolidation team. Oversaw implementation of standard IT processes, tools, and process improvements at worldwide enterprise levels. Created and conducted training programs.•	Played key role in company’s achievement of $250M in savings over two-year period.•	Implemented QA business processes based on SEI/CMM to support application deployment and operation.•	Formulated highly effective websites as tools to support quality programs and global project management methodology.•	Created and instructed workshops in process redesign to assist IT departments in re-evaluation and updating of core processes.•	Implemented IT business model later adopted as enterprise-wide standard.•	Improved project development/deployment life cycles by introducing SEI Best Practices to all business units in Europe, Asia, and US.•	Successfully managed organization’s Y2K preparedness efforts to 100% compliance. Established global Y2K operations center.
Sr. Development Manager - Product Owner - Global IT Messaging, Web & Directory Infrastructure

Directed product development and operations for key infrastructure areas. Supervised 15 senior programmers and service managers. Administered $4M budget. Held operational management responsibility for global messaging, directory, enterprise gateway, and automated EDI infrastructures. Represented company in standards and architecture committees. •	Saved $12M and reduced computing resources 50% over life of multi-lingual, standards-based messaging, directory, and personal planning application. Utilized Six Sigma methodologies to direct development cycle that produced zero defects. Product influenced development of Microsoft Outlook and earned the team a CIO Recognition Award.•	Directed design, development and worldwide deployment of Directory Services infrastructure that influenced development of Microsoft Active Directory and earned the team the Dunn & Bradstreet Innovators Award. •	Managed development of corporation’s EDI Schedule Sharing service and corporate TCI/IP gateway/firewall services.•	Established vendor software QA laboratory and problem management database that earned a Microsoft Award.•	Received Corporate IT VP Award for singular success in attaining SEI Level 2 in eight months, less than half of industry standard timeframe.
